## Source: ossf-package-analysis (23310826a7310567370020e364d6dedeb87558d2ce0ffcf5bc6054d70951bf3c)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'eslint-plugin-ally-rules' @ 1.0.5 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
